name: happy-admin-api
description: Happy Admin API - Analytics Engine dashboard backend

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(!process.env.INIT_CWD?.endsWith('/happy')){console.error('‚ùå Run yarn install from monorepo root');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.help:
echo '
Happy Admin API - Available Scripts
====================================

Development:
  dev                Start Wrangler dev server

Deployment:
  deploy:dev         Deploy to development environment
  deploy:prod        Deploy to production environment

Code Quality:
  typecheck          Type-check TypeScript
  lint               Run oxlint
  lint:fix           Run oxlint with auto-fix
  test               Run tests with Vitest
  test:security      Run security-specific tests

Database:
  db:generate        Generate Better-Auth migrations
  db:migrate         Apply migrations to remote dev D1
  db:migrate:prod    Apply migrations to remote prod D1
'
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env dev --remote
scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env prod --remote
